project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a program to perform basic data analysis on a CSV file, allowing users to calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement function to calculate mean for specified columns
Implement function to calculate median for specified columns
Implement function to calculate mode for specified columns
Implement user input functionality to specify columns for analysis
Write tests for each of the functions above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they function correctly
